title: 한국유져들 찾습니다 Looking for korean summoners ONLY
body:
티어 상관업고 현재 ifyoulovekorea 클럽 운영중입니다 20이상 있고
접률 좋으신분 환영합니다.

djsicka / naven  친추 걸어주세요

replies.body: Did you have to put "only"? And all caps?

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=Rclnadul,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-15T06:50:21.860+0000)
>
> Did you have to put "only"? And all caps?

Yes

Well he probably just wants Koreans since the members can't speak English.

뭐죠 모든 싫어요 과?
